title: Unable to connect to chat, you may reconnect manually.
body:
- When I log in it comes up with "we have encountered an error", "unable to connect"
- I cannot talk to friends 
- I cannot talk during champ select 
- But I can still access all other features of the client and talk in game 

Any help would be greatly appreciated as this is annoying. 

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

There is currently a known issue affecting chat, network operations are currently working on the problem.

For further updates, see the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) page.
